https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sCrLZYF7TU32Vk5bOIJneVAcoKE.jpg In the 1970s, a British sound technician is brought to Italy to work on the sound effects for a gruesome horror film. His nightmarish task slowly takes over his psyche, driving him to confront his own past. Berberian Sound Studio
